error.message: Unsupported SET statement: SET ARITHABORT ON
Unsupported SET statement: SET DATEFORMAT MDY
Unsupported SET statement: SET FIPS_FLAGGER OFF
Unsupported SET statement: SET NOEXEC OFF
Unsupported SET statement: SET OFFSETS SELECT, FROM, EXECUTE ON
Unsupported SET statement: SET STATISTICS TIME ON
Only LOW is supported for SET statement: SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY HIGH
Only ON is supported for SET statement: SET NOCOUNT OFF
Only ON is supported for SET statement: SET XACT_ABORT OFF
SET XACT_ABORT ON should be set when working with BEGIN TRANSACTION without a custom TRY..CATCH block to ensure the transaction is rolled back in case of an error
